column5: So my car (Volvo xc90) started making a faint clicking sound from one of the axles and being a Volvo, they are very picky about quality parts and a brand new one cost an arm and a leg lol.  Good thing I do most work on my cars, so I plan to take out the axle and get it rebuilt if the price is right.  Are there any shops in the GTA that anyone has experience with.  I live in Mississauga /Oakville area so something in this area would be great but willing to go further if there is a good rebuilder.  Would hate to have a shoddy rebuild job done only to have to get it done again.  Thanks
when I worked at a shop in Burlington we used a place called euro-drive.  they're on plains road just before maple avenue.  http://www.euro-drive.com
awesome! Thanks.  That's exactly what I was looking for. $105 to rebuilt the axle sounds fair considering a new one costs $600!
I've used Good Neighbor Garage in Bronte (the gas station just west of Bronte Creek on Lakeshore) and have nothing but good things to say about them
